column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (a command-line argument)"|"relative:///main.c:13:27:13:30"]], dangerously concatenated into [["strncat output argument"|"relative:///main.c:18:25:18:27"]], and then passed to system(__command).
